item.title: News: New Stroom Documentation Site
item.description:
The Stroom documentation has been re-vamped with a new look and feel. The documentation is now versioned so that you are only reading documentation applicable to one minor version of stroom.

Other improvements:

  • Addtion of News and Releases sections
  • Better site and page navigation with the left and right hand menus
  • Tagging of content to help find related material
